original_text: Saul was told that David had gone to Keilah, and he said, “God has delivered him into my hands, for David has imprisoned himself by entering a town with gates and bars.”
korean_text: 다윗이 그일라에 온 것을 어떤 사람이 사울에게 알리매 사울이 이르되 하나님이 그를 내 손에 넘기셨도다 그가 문과 문 빗장이 있는 성읍에 들어갔으니 갇혔도다

sentences.original_text: Saul was told that David had gone to Keilah
sentences.korean_translation: 사울은 다윗이 게일라로 갔다는 말을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: "God has delivered him into my hands
by entering a town with gates and bars."
